mapper.select: SELECT examination.exam_id, examination.exam_name, examination.exam_time, examination.exam_address, course_name, administrator.admin_name FROM examination, course, administrator WHERE examination.course_id = course.course_id AND administrator.admin_id = examination.admin_id
